title: Remember the Two of Us
description: What would you do if your boyfriend shows up after disappearing for months and he has no memory of you?Stacy's boyfriend, Markus, ghosted her. She was left to wait at the ice cream parlor for her date who had no plans of showing up.Heartbroken and angry, Stacy did not expect to see Markus again, much less at the dinner party at her house.Can Markus's heart remember what his mind could not?This is a stand-alone novel.
author: Nikki Gaspar
